name: places/ChIJQ_NuyotYwokR_Hogth69vPc
formattedAddress: 133 W 72nd St #704, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 133 W 72nd St #704, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text:
Aaron is a highly capable 'fixer' of our daily (and more serious) problems. The fire of bodily aches and pains and other physical (and mental) afflictions are adeptly extinguished through his skilled application of acupuncture. If all you've got is apparently superficial, I can attest to his proficiency, and give Shuniya my highest recommendation.
With that high praise in mind, I think Aaron's greatest asset is his intuitively driven, bespoke approach to systemic issues. His genuine presence and personal attention in each session assures that conversations/treatments interrupted by weeks between sessions are seamless, and it's clear that he's thoughtfully prepared for each interaction.
Sessions aren't cheap and office hours are not super-convenient for the modern professional...but I know I'll be back.

originalText.text:
Rare are those who can teach us how to handle to process of healing in all its colors.
Throughout the time Aaron led our energy healing sessions, I came to have a better understanding of the language of my body, the power of patience, and the importance of balancing grit with self-care. Aaron's attentive focus, calm demeanor, and resolve were as impactful on my well-being as they were instructive to my character.

Each session felt like a relaxed transformation, unshaded by struggle or effort. Aaron had a plan for what we would focus on, a deliberate strategy for how we would accomplish our goal, and slowly we chipped away at a painful physiological issue, minimizing what had for months been an impossible reality until it very nearly disappeared.

The most important aspect of the counseling Aaron imparted was coming to a simple acceptance of what is, relinquishing the need to mask or control specific conditions in order to then "be well." This lesson is like an invisible salve for all other daily plagues and pinches, immediately shutting off the emotional charge that comes with resisting physical truth. Undeniably, the result achieved through Aaron's treatment was more profound and pervasive than what several other practitioners in various fields were able to accomplish - and I have visited a half dozen specialists who each ended with a shrug.

Aaron's is a talent and dexterity gracefully matched with enlightened, humble compassion.
I feel lucky to have benefitted from his untiring determination to excavate blockages to healing- mentally, emotionally, and physically.
And I'm grateful that others have since experienced the curious light he brings to each life he touches.

originalText.text: I began working with Aaron after a recent cancer diagnosis and experienced excellent results almost immediately.  After our first two sessions, for example, we worked through some chronic stress that had plagued me for 50 years. After my fourth healing session, I took an unprecedented 3.5 hour nap and woke up feeling incredibly refreshed. Last week, my doctor told me that I’m cancer-free and in remission. I have a heart full of gratitude to Aaron for being one of the people on my team to help me get there.

originalText.text:
My first encounter with Aaron was during a Sat Nam Rasayan class he was leading. Right away I loved his class and was drawn to his clinic as a patient. As a teacher of Sat Nam Rasayan, he taught me how to trust my inner guidance and I experienced amazing levels of expanded consciousness while he was leading the class.
As a healer and coach, he was working in so many levels: physical, mental, and emotional with a total integrative approach of healing.
It was a true pleasure to have him as my teacher, healer and coach.
His uplifting and calming presence coupled with his wisdom and compassion are precious gifts I had the pleasure to share.

originalText.text:
"Because I teach ballet and make instructional videos, it is of utmost importance that I am able to demonstrate movements correctly and move about the classroom. In recent years my mobility and flexibility have decreased due to what was diagnosed as a severely arthritic right hip. It was painful to climb stairs. My hip would stiffen after prolonged sitting. It was difficult to sleep comfortably. This was becoming very worrisome and threatening to my career and well-being. Rather than have hip surgery I sought alternative means and found Aaron Teich. His gentle healing methods and knowledge have worked wonders. Aaron has led me to new solutions for old problems: My hip and leg are getting strong enough to teach comfortably and walk upstairs without pain; I am enjoying sleep as never before; the problem of chronic sinus and jaw pain as well as sensitive teeth has been solved; and, I am steadily lowering my high blood pressure. Truly, Aaron Teich has the gift of healing and the ability to enlighten. Bravo!"
— Finis Jhung, Ballet Teacher, Video Instructor, New York, NY
